game.name: Whispering Lane: Horror
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Remote Play on Phone, Remote Play on Tablet, Family Sharing, Steam Timeline
game.shortDescription: 이 심리 공포 게임에서 위스퍼링 레인에 있는 버려진 집의 어두운 비밀을 밝혀내세요. 매 턴마다 공포와 미스터리가 뒤섞인 위험한 반전을 헤쳐나가세요. 어둠이 당신을 집어삼키기 전에 진실을 밝혀낼 수 있을까요?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Uncover the dark secrets of the abandoned house on Whispering Lane in this psychological horror game. Navigate through perilous twists, where each turn reveals a blend of horror and mystery. Can you unearth the truth before darkness consumes you?

reviewHighlights.text: This was alright to begin with, it started off as this creepy and atmospheric walking simulator, as the streamer & the police officer to begin with, w...
